metadata.title: About Coello One
metadata.description: Meet the one-sleeve performance house celebrating athletes who treat their bodies as galleries.

hero.title: One sleeve. Every story on display.
hero.description: Empowering you to showcase your story—one sleeve at a time. Coello One fuses bold design with technical performance so your art and athleticism never have to compete.

story.title: Built for the niche-within-a-niche
paragraphs: We always saw a disconnect. You commit hours under the needle so your story lives on your skin, then you grind through training only to cover it up. At Coello, we believe your art and your athleticism come from the same fire.

Our one-sleeve design is not a gimmick. It is the frame your masterpiece deserves—technical apparel tuned for performance, with a fit that finally celebrates the way you've chosen to express yourself.
This brand is for everyone who knows the patience of the artist's chair and the burn of the last rep. We are a statement as much as we are a garment.

quote.text: Both your art and your training are proof of persistence. Our job is to let that proof be seen.

pillars.title: Intentional asymmetry
pillars.description: 3D body mapping keeps compression where you need stability and releases the tattooed side so ink stays breathable and bright.

pillars.title: Performance-grade fabrics
pillars.description: Moisture-channeling Italian yarns, micro-wicking mesh, and bonded seams move with every lift, stride, and strike.

pillars.title: Community-built rituals
pillars.description: We co-create with athletes who are also canvases—from muralists to MMA artists—so every drop honors lived experience.

milestones.title: Observation
milestones.description: Noticed elite athletes hiding tattoos mid-training and mapped the ergonomic gap.

milestones.title: First lab
milestones.description: Built our first asymmetrical prototypes alongside illustrators and sprinters in Barcelona.

milestones.title: Material breakthrough
milestones.description: Locked a fabric recipe that keeps saturated ink tones cooler by up to 3ºC.

milestones.title: Community drop
milestones.description: Opened the One Sleeve Residency so athletes can prototype live with Laura's team.

milestones.title: Global debut
milestones.description: Coello One launches internationally with localized education hubs and athlete storytelling.

metadata.title: Discounts & VIP access
metadata.description: The waitlist for future drops that actually matter.

hero.title: We don't run endless sales. We plan precise rewards.
hero.description: Join the insider list to unlock the next promo window, exclusive color studies, and residency invites.

statusCard.title: No blanket promos today
statusCard.body: We'd rather protect craftsmanship than slash prices every weekend. The next offer will be limited, intentional, and delivered directly to this list first.

benefits.title: Launch-window pricing
benefits.description: Be the first to know when a new one-sleeve colorway or fabric update drops and receive a one-time code.

benefits.title: Residency invites
benefits.description: Priority access to virtual workshops with Laura and guest athletes to co-design future releases.

benefits.title: Training intelligence
benefits.description: Monthly micro-guides from the Coello One Blueprint tailored to recovering skin and high-output weeks.

privacy.title: Our privacy promise
points: No spam—just purposeful updates tied to drops or education.
Data stays with Coello. We will never sell, rent, or trade your contact details.
You can leave the list at any time with a single click.

form.title: Reserve your future code
form.description: Add your email to be notified the moment we activate a discount or private launch.
form.privacyNote: By submitting you agree to receive curated Coello updates. No spam, promise.
form.successDescription: We'll notify you ahead of the next promo window—expect something purposeful, not spammy.

validation.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

metadata.title: Coello One Hub
metadata.description: Science-backed micro protocols for athletes who wear their story.

hero.title: Four algorithms for bodies that double as canvases.
hero.description: Hover for the codename, tap for the TL;DR, and save the ritual before your next session.

protocols.title: Repair
protocols.subtitle: The Recovery Protocol
protocols.summary: Deep sleep is the pigment lab. Time your light so cortisol fires early and melatonin lands when tissue repair peaks.

science.title: Sleeping for saturation
science.description: Slow-wave sleep releases growth hormone that reseals skin elasticity, keeping saturated ink sharp.

protocols.action: Anchor your circadian clock with 10k lux within 20 minutes of waking, then blackout the tattooed side and cool the room to finish the loop 14 hours later.
microDose: Track light in lux, not vibes

protocols.title: Preserve
protocols.subtitle: The Canvas Preservation
protocols.summary: Eat like you own a gallery. Sugar stiffens collagen and blurs ink, so meals must protect the canvas.

science.title: Dermal nutrition
science.description: Advanced glycation end-products bind to collagen, yellowing skin and softening tattoo edges.

protocols.action: Cycle low-glycation plates and load collagen precursors—vitamin C, copper, glycine—to keep line-work crisp.
tlDr: Ditch added sugar on training days
2 g glycine + vitamin C before meals

protocols.title: Endure
protocols.subtitle: The Pain Tolerance Protocol
protocols.summary: Tattoo chair discipline mirrors the last rep. Train your nervous system to crave friction, not stacked dopamine hits.

science.title: Friction equals focus
science.description: Avoid layering stimulants. Single-source discomfort maintains dopamine sensitivity so effort stays rewarding.

protocols.action: Schedule silent sessions—no music, no pre-workout, phone on airplane mode—to remind the brain you can ride discomfort without reward spikes.
tlDr: Journal the toughest set like a tattoo sit
microDose: Swap hype playlists for breath cadence
Use nasal breathing through burn sets
Anchor reframing phrases before big lifts

protocols.title: Charge
protocols.subtitle: The Asymmetric Engine
protocols.summary: Own asymmetry. Train one side to light up the other through neural cross-education while the tattoo heals.

science.title: Cross-education
science.description: Unilateral work preserves strength on the resting limb via neural drive, keeping the one-sleeve silhouette powerful.

protocols.action: Stack single-arm rows, landmine presses, pistol progressions, and loaded carries that highlight the asymmetrical frame.
tlDr: Pair strength sets with isometric holds
Finish with loaded carries on the ink side
microDose: Balance carries for 60 seconds per side
Light vibration on resting arm for priming

hero.title: The Gym is the Stimulus. The Lifestyle is the Engine.
hero.description: We train to send a signal—"build armor"—not to erase calories. Appetite, hormones, and stress management deliver the real fat loss. This page is your protocol for sending the correct signal, then living in a way that lets the body respond.

manifesto.headline: You Cannot Out-Train Your Fork.
manifesto.subheading: Strength work is a signal, not a calorie eraser. We lift to send a message—build armor—then live to let that message land.

bulletPoints.title: Signal First
bulletPoints.description: Training tells the body what to adapt to. Nervous-system friendly tension beats random sweat every time.

bulletPoints.title: Lifestyle Drives Leanness
bulletPoints.description: Only a sliver of daily expenditure comes from lifting. Sleep, stress, and food quality dictate the actual recomposition.

bulletPoints.title: Nature Resets Hormones
bulletPoints.description: Get outside weekly. Horizons flatten cortisol, sunlight wakes the endocrine system, and boredom fuels creativity.

planSelector.description: Choose the archetype that matches your season. Each toggle instantly redraws the plan.

essentialist.name: The Essentialist
essentialist.description: Designed for the busy creative. Focus purely on the Big 3 lifts to ground the nervous system without exhaustion.

architect.name: The Architect
architect.description: The gold standard for aesthetics. Balances heavy loading with adequate central nervous system recovery.

craftsman.name: The Craftsman
craftsman.description: High volume for those who treat their body as the primary project. Includes isolation work for the Coello sleeve arm.

ritual.title: The Decompression
ritual.philosophy: You tightened the muscle to break it. Now lengthen it to heal it.

cards.label: Cardio
cards.description: 20 mins Zone 2 Cardio (nasal breathing only). Heart rate 120-130 bpm.

cards.label: Stretch
cards.description: 10 mins static holds. Focus on hip flexors and chest openers.

cards.label: Sunday Service
cards.description: Weekly hike or nature walk is mandatory. Artificial light and concrete spike cortisol; horizons reset your biology.

living.title: Living Component
living.description: Mandatory weekly hike or nature walk. Artificial light, concrete, and doomscrolling spike cortisol; horizons reset your biology.
living.diet: Eat food that ran, swam, or grew. If it has a barcode, interrogate it. Ferments, roots, and minerals keep the signal responsive.

metadata.title: Sustainability
metadata.description: Purposeful materials, short supply chains, and radical transparency.

hero.title: Performance gear that respects the canvas and the planet.
hero.description: We keep our footprint lean through recycled inputs, renewable energy partners, and made-to-order micro runs.

initiatives.title: Low-impact textiles
initiatives.description: 70% of each one-sleeve is spun from recycled nylon blended with bio-based elastane to keep stretch high and waste low.

initiatives.title: Traceable production
initiatives.description: Six partner ateliers across Portugal and Spain share live dashboards on water, energy, and labor benchmarks.

initiatives.title: Repair > replace
initiatives.description: Free seam reinforcement and re-dye service for products within 24 months to extend every garment's story.

materials.title: Material stack
items: SeaCell® fibers calm freshly inked skin with natural antioxidants.
Dope-dyed yarns lock in color while cutting chemical baths by 40%.
Biodegradable packaging sleeves made from FSC-certified pulp.

steps.title: Measure
steps.description: Third-party audit of every supplier plus public reporting.

steps.title: Reduce
steps.description: Shift to 100% renewable cutting rooms and recycled trims.

steps.title: Regenerate
steps.description: Invest in tattoo-friendly reforestation projects with local artists.
